mapper.insert: insert into photostory(photostory_no, planner_no, member_no, photostory_content) values(#{photostoryNo}, #{plannerNo}, #{memberNo}, #{photostoryContent})
mapper.select: select photostory_like_count from photostory where photostory_no = #{photostoryNo}
select photostory_comment_count from photostory where photostory_no = #{photostoryNo}
